products.title: Lumiere Unlined Bijou Linen White Roman Blind
products.metadescription: A clean and fresh appearance makes their scrumptious lumiere unlined bijou linen white roman blind a clear winner.      The crisp white colour oozes modernity and grace, perfect for a chic look. The design is simply timeless, making your home feel bright and spacious all year round
